page.title: 13Pebworth Health
page.content: Residents must travel 5 - l0 miles to a doctor's surgery, transport being arranged for the elderly or disabled. Most Pebworth families attend Bidford Health Centre, which has four doctors and provides Community Health services ( antenatal care, speech therapy and chiropody). Pebworth Post Office acts as a distribution point for some prescriptions. Long Marston families go to Quinton or Mickleton where one doctor serves two surgeries. Family doctors immunise children and visit patients as necessary. A health visitor and district nurse also attend patients. Hospitals serving this area are Stratford, Warwick, Evesham and Worcester. Small local maternity units e.g. Stratford's Monroe-Devis,are closing in favour of larger ones at Leamington & Worcester, both over 20 miles away.
